headline: Looking At The Narrative For First Horizon (FHN) As M&A And 2026 Outlook Shift
summary: Why the Fair Value Estimate for First Horizon Just Ticked Higher Analysts have nudged their fair value estimate for First Horizon from about US$25.25 to around US$26.51, backed by slightly higher assumptions for revenue growth and a small adjustment to the discount rate used in their models. The updated view is based on research that considers 2026 earnings potential, mid single digit loan growth, and a possible role in future merger and acquisition activity as key elements in the long term...
